Pre-Game Insights: Burundi have never beaten Burkina Faso in their three previous matches, conceding nine goals while scoring only twice.
Burkina Faso have been a regular feature at the Africa Cup of Nations over the past decade, having only failed to reach the main draw once in each of the last eight editions.
Burkina Faso are currently leading the group with seven points and hold a healthy +5 goal difference.
Burkina Faso have scored in every match since Traore's arrival and have netted eight goals in this competition so far, the second-most among participating nations.
Burundi's Etienne Ndayiragije would have taken a few positives from the match, mainly that his side managed to register more shots at goal than their opponents.
